text: Abbey Road DLR station is a Docklands Light Railway station in the West Ham neighbourhood of the London Borough of Newham, in East London, England. It is located on the Stratford International extension of the Docklands Light Railway.Docklands Light Railway - Stratford International Extension ==References== Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Newham Category:West Ham
title: Abbey Road DLR station
